title: Blue-Collar Workers Make the Leap to Tech Jobs, No College Degree Necessary - The Wall Street Journal
content: Blue-Collar Workers Make the Leap to Tech Jobs, No College Degree Necessary  The Wall Street Journal
description: The pandemic has helped catapult Americans in low-paying roles into more upwardly mobile careers, often involving technology skills. Demand for employees is so high that companies are dropping prequalifications and adding training programs.
